bike.description: All new Stumpjumper FSR M5 manipulated alloy frame w/ ORE TT/DT for 29" wheel, sealed cartridge bearing pivots, DMD Direct Mount Der, replaceable derailleur hanger, disc only, 105mm travel

components.description: Specialized AFR Shock w/ remote Trail Tune inertia valve, adj rebound and Brain Fade, 7.25x1.5"
Shimano M581 LX, DMD, top swing, dual pull
2014 butted alloy, two bolt non-setback, 30.9 x 350/400mm
Alloy collar w/ QR, 34.9mm clamp ID
Protective clear coat, derailleur hanger, owners manual
